price: (36) Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses
arabic: أَمۡ لَمۡ يُنَبَّأۡ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: am lam yunabba bimā fī ṣuḥufi mūsā
